TopicTitle: Laytheshot 4's interplanetary speed Laythe aerobraking maneuver.

Articles.Content:
If you've read the Genius Ideas thread, you'll know that Laytheshot 4 is the one that I had to move the habitat and communications modules to a side port because I couldn't attach them at the nose after decoupling them.

This is what happened when I went down to 19Km above Laythe at 6000 metres per second.

http://imgur.com/a/ocjKm
Sounds as safe as sunbathing on Laythe without lead-lined underwear!

Sounds as safe as sunbathing on Laythe without lead-lined underwear!

That sounds rather painful!
